title: mangala guNarNava
sahitya:
mangala guNArNava pAhi mahAnubhAva sanga haraNa bhAva vidyAdhirAja dEva

anupallavi

 tunga vEdAnta shaila shrnga vihAralOla vamgayati pravari kIrtita jnAnashIla

caraNam

 sakalada shrta sulabha santAnaka sannibha sakaruNa divyashObha vimala tApasarSabha 
shakalita mada lObha sakala kalA vallabha shAmaghana vana tulasI pUjita hiraNyAbha
